raw_text: GANHEWA – THUSITHA LALITH – Beloved husband of Dilmini, loving brother of late Asoka, Gamini (Australia), Damayanthi (USA), Jayatha (Germany) Saman and beloved son of late Premachandra and Daisy Florence Ganhewa, expired after a brief illness. For funeral arrangements please contact: 071-5984511.12112301
